name: Associação Portuguesa de Fundos de Investimento, Pensões e Patrimónios
goal: A APFIPP é uma Associação sem fins lucrativos que tem por objecto a representação e a defesa dos interesses das suas Associadas, contribuindo, designadamente, para a promoção e desenvolvimento das Indústrias de Fundos de Investimento Mobiliário, de Fundos de Investimento Imobiliário, de Fundos de Pensões e de Gestão Discricionária portuguesas, e do espaço único europeu, onde as mesmas operam profissionalmente, enquanto Entidades Gestoras de Activos e de Fundos de Pensões, de harmonia com a legislação nacional e comunitária aplicável.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
No âmbito da sua actividade, a APFIPP acompanha diversos dossiês legislativos europeus, em particular no contexto de políticas sobre assuntos económicos, finanças e fiscalidade, destacando-se as seguintes iniciativas: UCITS, AIFMD, Institutions for Occupational Retirement Provision (IORPs), EU Single Market for Personal Pension Products, Packaged Retail and Insurance-based Investment Products (PRIIPS), Capital Markets Union, Investment Services and Regulated Markets (MiFID 1 & MiFID 2 & MiFIR), Retail Investment Products / Financial Services, Cross-Border Distribution
Money Market Funds, European Fund Classification
European Long-Term Investment Funds (ELTIF), European Social Entrepreneurship Funds (EuSEF), Capital Requirements Directives, Recovery and Resolution Directive, Market Abuse, Indices and Benchmarks, Prospectus Directive, Sustainable Finance
Transparency Directive, Investor Compensation Scheme Directive, Short Selling Regulation, Derivatives / EMIR
Central Securities Depositories, Clearing and Settlement
Securitisation, IAS/IFRS Standards and Interpretations
Credit Rating Agencies, Anti-Money Laundering Regulation, Financial Education / Investor Education, FTT - Financial Transaction Tax, FATCA - Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, VAT Directive, Data Protection, Regulation, Fintech / Digitalisation.
